concept.title: Tools Overview
concept.shortdesc: Square uses many tools to make businesses successful and profitable.

div.p: With Team Managment, Square users can easily manage their employees and save on labor costs all for free. Team management allows businesses to track their emploess clock in and out from the register. Team managment also offers real-time reports to save on labor costs. Employers can also grant certain employees specific access levels depending on their position.

ul.li: Track team hours, overtime, and breaks
Designed with Retail and Resteraunts in mind

div.p: Square makes payroll simple for users. Square offers a full-service payroll built by Square. The payroll service is an all in one solution that works with every type of business. Square's online payroll service start at $34 per month for users. Payroll syncs with employee timecards and POS.
Pricing: Square users pay $29 monthly plus $5 a month per person paid.

ul.li: Payroll and tax filings taken care by Square
